text: May is a genus of spiders in the family Sparassidae. It was first described in 2015 by Peter Jäger and Henrik Krehenwinkel. ==Species== , the World Spider Catalog accepted the following species, all found in southern Africa: *May ansie Jäger & Krehenwinkel, 2015 – Namibia *May bruno Jäger & Krehenwinkel, 2015 (type species) – South Africa *May norm Jäger & Krehenwinkel, 2015 – Namibia *May rudy Jäger & Krehenwinkel, 2015 – Namibia ==References== Category:Sparassidae Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Africa
title: May (spider)
